alert.note: Alert for Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:39PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN SAWYER COUNTY THROUGH 715 PM CDT... At 638 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Round Lake, or near Chippewa Flowage West, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported half inch hail in Hayward. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chippewa Flowage East around 655 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
